td.content: s:55 yo female describes critical night blindness and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. denies any alcohol use denies any smoking o:Height 66 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Full-Field Electroretinogram Non-recordable (extinguished) ERG, Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on the face, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Full-Field Electroretinogram, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:pt c/o 2 weeks h/o severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. NKDA. patient is a 57 yo white female web developer. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies smoking o:Height 66 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Multifocal Electroretinography (+) Multifocal deficiencies of maculae on ERG a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Multifocal Electroretinography, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
